prompts.question: What destinations does Starship Cruises offer?
prompts.answer: From the bustling markets of Coruscant to the serene lakes of Naboo, Starship Cruises offers a wide range of destinations across the galaxy. Explore iconic locations, hidden gems, and even embark on exclusive tours of historical battle sites, such as the fields of Geonosis.

prompts.question: Can I customize my itinerary?
prompts.answer: Absolutely! Our Galactic Concierge is at your service to tailor your journey, whether you wish to dine with Ewoks on Endor or explore ancient Sith temples on Korriban. Your adventure is limited only by the stars!

prompts.question: What are the cabin options?
prompts.answer: Choose from a variety of cabin options, including Standard Star Cabins, Nebula Suites, and the exclusive Emperor's Penthouse, complete with a personal astromech droid. Enjoy panoramic views of the cosmos and accommodations fit for a Jedi Master.

prompts.question: Is there a cancellation policy?
prompts.answer: Yes, we offer a flexible cancellation policy. Cancel up to 30 standard galactic days before departure for a full refund, excluding lightsaber training deposits. Please refer to our holosite for detailed terms and conditions.

prompts.question: What's the policy on droids?
prompts.answer: Droids are welcome aboard Starship Cruises! We offer specialized charging stations and even droid-friendly entertainment options. Protocol droids fluent in over six million forms of communication are available to assist with any needs.

prompts.question: How do I apply for a job at Starship Cruises?
prompts.answer: Join the ranks of the galaxy's finest crew! Apply online through our holosite or visit one of our recruitment centers located on major planets. Opportunities range from starship pilots to entertainment coordinators. May the Force guide your application!

prompts.question: Can I host a private event or conference?
prompts.answer: Host your next galactic summit or interstellar wedding aboard our starships. Our event planning droids will ensure every detail is perfect, from zero-gravity dance floors to cuisine prepared by renowned chefs from across the galaxy.

prompts.question: What happens if I lose something on board?
prompts.answer: Lost a lightsaber or misplaced your Mandalorian helmet? Contact our Lost & Found department, and our droids will search every nook and cranny of the starship. We'll make every effort to reunite you with your belongings, even those left in a galaxy far, far away.

prompts.question: Are there any age restrictions for travelers?
prompts.answer: Travelers of all ages are welcome! Special activities and areas are available for young Padawans, while our exclusive Cantina Lounge offers entertainment for adults. Please note that some excursions, such as the Death Star Memorial Tour, may have age restrictions.

prompts.question: What currency is accepted on board?
prompts.answer: We accept a wide range of galactic credits, including but not limited to Republic Dataries, Imperial Credits, and select cryptocurrencies. Currency exchange services are available on board for travelers from distant star systems.

prompts.question: Do you offer special accommodations for different species?
prompts.answer: Starship Cruises celebrates the diversity of the galaxy! Our starships are equipped to accommodate various species, including aquatic environments for Mon Calamari guests and specialized gravity settings for those from low-gravity planets.

prompts.question: What's the policy on bringing my own spacecraft?
prompts.answer: Guests with personal spacecraft may utilize our starship docking bays, subject to availability. Please provide your spacecraft registration and hyperdrive class at the time of booking. Complimentary valet asteroid parking is available.

prompts.question: How can I provide feedback about my experience?
prompts.answer: We value your feedback, whether it's praise for our droid staff or suggestions for new destinations (Hoth in summer, anyone?). Share your thoughts through our holosite or directly with our Galactic Concierge. Your insights help us create even more stellar experiences!

prompts.question: Are gift vouchers available?
prompts.answer: Gift the experience of a lifetime with Starship Cruises gift vouchers! Available in various denominations, they're the perfect present for aspiring Jedi, seasoned space travelers, or anyone with a love for the stars. Purchase online or at our galactic travel centers.
